verses.verse: "You shall not <S%H5375>bear<s%> a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H8088>report;<s%> do not <S%H7896>join<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> to be a <S%H2555>malicious<s%> <S%H5707>witness.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H1961>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> in doing <S%H9567>evil,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H6030>testify<s%> in a <S%H7379>dispute<s%> so as to <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> in order to <S%H5186>pervert<s%> [justice;]
<S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you be <S%H1921>partial<s%> to a <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H1800>man<s%> in his <S%H7379>dispute.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you <S%H6293>meet<s%> your enemy's <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H8582>wandering<s%> <S%H8582>away,<s%> you shall <S%H7725>surely<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> it to him.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> of one who <S%H8130>hates<s%> you <S%H7257>lying<s%> [helpless] <S%H8478>under<s%> its <S%H4853>load,<s%> you shall <S%H2308>refrain<s%> from <S%H5800>leaving<s%> it to him, you shall <S%H5800>surely<s%> <S%H5800>release<s%> [it] with him.
"You shall not <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H4941>justice<s%> [due] to your <S%H34>needy<s%> [brother] in his <S%H7379>dispute.<s%>

<S%H7368>"Keep<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H1697>charge,<s%> and do not <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H9345>innocent<s%> or the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> for I will not <S%H6663>acquit<s%> the <S%H7563>guilty.<s%>
"And you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> for a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> <S%H5786>blinds<s%> the clear-sighted and <S%H5557>subverts<s%> the <S%H1697>cause<s%> of the <S%H6662>just.<s%>

"And you shall not <S%H3905>oppress<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> since you <S%H9043>yourselves<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5315>feelings<s%> of a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> for you [also] were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> in its <S%H8393>yield,<s%>

but [on] the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7637>year<s%> you shall <S%H8058>let<s%> it <S%H8058>rest<s%> and <S%H5203>lie<s%> <S%H5203>fallow,<s%> so that the <S%H34>needy<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H398>eat;<s%> and whatever they <S%H3499>leave<s%> the <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> may <S%H398>eat.<s%> You are to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H3651>same<s%> with your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> [and] your <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>grove.<s%>

<S%H8337>"Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you are to <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H4639>work,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>cease<s%> [from labor] in <S%H4616>order<s%> that your <S%H7794>ox<s%> and your <S%H2543>donkey<s%> may <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>slave,<s%> as well as your <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> may <S%H5314>refresh<s%> themselves.

"Now concerning <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H559>said<s%> to you, be on your <S%H8104>guard;<s%> and do not <S%H2142>mention<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> let [them] be <S%H8085>heard<s%> from your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H7969>"Three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> a <S%H2287>feast<s%> to Me.

"You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H4682>Unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>Bread;<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you are to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, at the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib,<s%> for in it you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> And <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me empty-handed.

"Also [you shall observe] the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of the <S%H7105>Harvest<s%> [of] the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H4639>labors<s%> [from] <S%H834>what<s%> you <S%H2232>sow<s%> in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> also the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of the <S%H614>Ingathering<s%> at the <S%H3318>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> when you <S%H622>gather<s%> in [the fruit of] your <S%H4639>labors<s%> from the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H7969>"Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of My <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H2557>bread;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> is the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of My <S%H2282>feast<s%> to <S%H3885>remain<s%> <S%H3885>overnight<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

"You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7225>choice<s%> <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>soil<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You are not to <S%H1310>boil<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in the <S%H2461>milk<s%> of its <S%H517>mother.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H8104>guard<s%> you along the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and to <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>

"Be on your <S%H8104>guard<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him and <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice;<s%> do not be <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> toward him, for he will not <S%H5375>pardon<s%> your <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> is in him.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>truly<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H1696>say,<s%> then I will be an <S%H340>enemy<s%> to your <S%H340>enemies<s%> and an <S%H9475>adversary<s%> to your <S%H6887>adversaries.<s%>

"For My <S%H4397>angel<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and <S%H935>bring<s%> you in to [the land of] the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites;<s%> and I will <S%H3582>completely<s%> <S%H3582>destroy<s%> them.

"You shall not <S%H7812>worship<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> according to their <S%H4639>deeds;<s%> but you shall <S%H2040>utterly<s%> <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> them, and <S%H7665>break<s%> their [sacred] <S%H4676>pillars<s%> in <S%H7665>pieces.<s%>

"But you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> and your <S%H4325>water;<s%> and I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H9258>sickness<s%> from your <S%H7130>midst.<s%>
"There shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> one <S%H7921>miscarrying<s%> or <S%H6135>barren<s%> in your <S%H776>land;<s%> I will <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"I will <S%H7971>send<s%> My <S%H367>terror<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of you, and <S%H2000>throw<s%> into <S%H2000>confusion<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> among <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H5414>turn<s%> [their] <S%H6203>backs<s%> to you.

"And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6880>hornets<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of you, that they may <S%H1644>drive<s%> out the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

"I will not <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out <S%H4480>before<s%> you in a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> that the <S%H776>land<s%> may not <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7231>become<s%> <S%H5921>too<s%> <S%H7231>numerous<s%> for you.

"I will <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out <S%H4480>before<s%> you <S%H4592>little<s%> by <S%H4592>little,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H6509>become<s%> <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H5157>take<s%> <S%H5157>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7896>fix<s%> your <S%H1366>boundary<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to the <S%H5104>River<s%> [Euphrates;] for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and you will <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out <S%H4480>before<s%> you.
"You shall <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them or with their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

"They shall not <S%H3427>live<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they make you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against Me; for [if] you <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> it will <S%H3588>surely<s%> be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to you."
